definitions.definition: A flag consisting of three stripes that are either vertical or horizontal , all of equal size, and each of a different colour.
examples: Tricolours are seen in the national flags of over twenty countries , including Belgium , France , India , Italy , Russia , The Netherlands and Ireland .

definitions.definition: Anything which is composed of three colours .

main_definition: A flag consisting of three stripes that are either vertical or horizontal , all of equal size, and each of a different colour.
secondary_definitions: ( uncommon ) Anything which is composed of three colours .
